attributes.action: Change the law for fathers to get more paternity time off.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why can't fathers whose baby is born c- section be giving more time off to help they're partners who can hardly do anything for approx 6-8 weeks to be home to help, Instead of the 2 weeks they get now,without losing money they need for the new family by taking unpaid leave.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
